summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general municipal election to be held in said city, on Tuesday, March 8, 1921, the proposition for the creating of an indebtedness in the sum of Two Hundred Thousand ($200,000.00) Dollars, by the issuance and sale of general, negotiable interest bearing, serial coupon bonds of the City of Seattle in said amount for the acquisition and improvement of play fields and play grounds and the resurfacing of park boulevards and parkways in said City.
